testcase.title: 001)On opening the DB accordion a picture tile is shown in the tile 3 position

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly

steps.title: the "New Home" page should be loaded on log on
I expand "Disease briefings" Accordion in Home Page
I verify image is displayed in tile three Accordion "Disease briefings"

substeps.message: title=Disease briefings,content=Browse all content related to Disease briefingsare present

steps.title: I verify Title "Disease briefings" and content "Browse all content related to Disease briefings" is present on pitcure tile under accordion "Disease briefings"
I collapse "Disease briefings" Accordion in Home Page

testcase.title: 002)Clicking on the picture tile opens the "Disease briefings" page

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly

steps.title: the "New Home" page should be loaded on log on
I expand "Disease briefings" Accordion in Home Page
I verify image is displayed in tile three Accordion "Disease briefings"
I click on image displayed in 'tile three' accordion "Disease briefings"
I verify Disease Briefings page is displayed
I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel on new Home page
I collapse "Disease briefings" Accordion in Home Page
